info.name: Declutter Series - DeviantArt GaLGaL
info.description: Removes everything except llama buttons, on GiveALlamaGetALlama. Faithful in style to unmodified DeviantArt. Compatible with most other themes, including Declutter Series - Deviantart. Designed to be used with the One Click Llama Button script. Part of the Declutter Series.
info.additionalInfo: Cannot be used without the One Click Llama Button script. One Click Llama Button (c) Kishan Bagaria. I am not associated in any way with GiveALlamaGetALlama or One Click Llama Button.
